title: Open Application
education: BA/BS Degree in Information Technology, Computer Science or related field or the equivalent of 4 years of professional experience in an IT application.
scope: We are always looking for talented individuals to join our team. If you are interested or want to learn more about our opportunities, please feel free to apply to our Open Application.
description: Orange Bees is a leader in the upstate region of South Carolina for its world-class software development. Established in 2013, Orange Bees, aim to improve the manufacturing, insurance, financial, association, and retail industries; where we have an extensive track record of success in Product Engineering, Enterprise Management, System Integration, Mobile Application Development, Web Application Development, and Data Analytics.
responsibilities: Visit client sites on occasion and represent the company in meetings
Communicate with other teammates respectably and be able to work on projects with a few developers
Engage with other developers and participate in dev scrums and planning
experience: Experience working in an Agile environment (preferred)
Initiative and the ability to work independently and in a team
knowledge: Understanding of Software Development Life Cycle and Agile methodologies
Initiative and the ability to work independently and in a team
